main_definition: in a way that is comparable or alike; in the same manner as something else previously mentioned.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To do something in a similar way or manner to what has been done before.
meanings_and_examples.example: She arranged her flowers similarly, with colorful blooms on each side of the vase.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In reference to things that are alike or share common characteristics.
meanings_and_examples.example: Both cats and dogs can be similar in terms of their loyalty to their owners.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When comparing two items, people, or situations, suggesting they have a resemblance.
meanings_and_examples.example: The two models looked remarkably similar, with only slight differences in facial features.
